arts.ttl: Inter Miami vs. Seattle Sounders: Leagues Cup Final Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: The Seattle Sounders aim for a ninth trophy, while Miami seeks to win a second Leagues Cup on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami Predicted Lineup vs. Seattle Sounders: Messi, Herons Seek Second Leagues Cup Title
arts.sum: Lionel Messi helped Inter Miami win their first Leagues Cup in just his first few games with the club in 2023.

arts.ttl: When does Messi play in the 2025 Leagues Cup final? Date and TV channel for Inter Miami vs Seattle Sounders
arts.sum: Inter Miami's opponent will be one of the most consistent clubs in the top places of the league played in the United States and Canada, we are talking about Seattle Sounders, who, despite having their first match as visitors in Carson, California, against Los Angeles Galaxy, ended up winning with authority to advance to their second Leagues Cup final, they are looking for revenge for the defeat in 2021 at the hands of Panzas Verdes del Leon. On the other hand, the two semifinal losers will also face off in the third-place game in a game that has its importance as the winner between Orlando City and Los Angeles Galaxy will have its ticket secured for the Concacaf Champions Cup in 2026, tickets that Inter Miami and Seattle Sounders already have.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami vs Seattle Sounders: What time does Messi play and where to watch the 2025 Leagues Cup final?
arts.sum: What time does Inter Miami vs Seattle Sounders kick off in the 2025 Leagues Cup final? The clash between Messi and the Sounders will be broadcast live in the United States on Apple TV+ and additionally on Univision and TUDN.
